I help career professionals in the Phoenix area accelerate their financial independence.As a full-service financial advisor, I deliver professional help with wealth preservation and distribution, retirement planning, financial risk reduction, tax reduction strategies, and protection of assets from catastrophic illness. My primary goal is to provide a safe and effective solution for my clients, allowing them to protect and preserve their estates while still seeking competitive returns on their investments. I accomplish this by offering a blend of financial services that is personally tailored to each client’s specific financial needs and circumstances.I serve a diverse range of clients, but I have a special focus on employees at later stages of life.WHAT TO EXPECT:To begin, I want to understand what’s important to you. I’ll ask you questions to learn about your goals, hopes, dreams and even fears. Once I know what you’re trying to accomplish, I’ll do a diagnosis of your situation. Then we can work together to craft and execute a custom plan.Are you interested? I’d love to get to know you better and see how I can help.

At Money Matters, we’re all about you. When you work with us, you’ll get more than typical financial planning. You’ll get personalized service from experienced professionals who’ll meet with you one-on one. You’ll get your own “watchdog,” who will help keep you up-to date on the current market, and keep your portfolio in shape. We’ll analyze your retirement needs and recommend strategies that are intended to help you maintain your preferred standard of living. We’ll assist you with Family Wealth Planning, and provide financial educational opportunities. Why do we go the extra mile? Because we want you to have the retirement you deserve.

North American Life Plans is a licensed insurance agency that specializes in the financial needs of retirees and those soon-to-be retired. We have financial professionals across the country whose mission is to provide you with excellent service, helpful advice and useful resources so that you can make an informed decision.

Prospect Pros, Inc. offers turn-key direct mail programs for the insurance industry. Our leads get the response rate you need to increase your sales. We’ve designed a system that allows you to get fresh, qualified leads daily.

As the expert in all things data, KBM Group helps its Fortune 1000 clients achieve remarkably better returns on their marketing investment by unlocking the value in their data and putting it to work. We are the global leader in knowledge-based marketing solutions.

summary: Do you have a solid plan to reach your financial goals?A great lifestyle doesn’t happen by accident. It takes careful planning to avoid the pitfalls of taxes, market risk, inflation, fees and litigation. You could choose to go it alone and hope for the best, or you could get me on your team.Imagine the peace of mind you could have with your retirement, college funding, legacy planning and other financial goals optimized by a professional. _______________________________________________________________________KEY BENEFITSThe CORE benefits of this service to you are:► Cutting-edge estate planning and wealth management techniques. That’s one less thing for you to worry about.► Easy access. My office is conveniently located in Scottsdale, Arizona. ► Personal solutions for your specific situation. I don’t have any cookie cutters in my office._______________________________________________________________________ABOUT MEI entered the financial services industry in 1999. After working for one of the largest Registered Investment Advisory firms in the country that managed billions of dollars, I decided to create a truly unique planning firm to deliver best-in-class financial services to working professionals in the Phoenix area. I am an Investment Advisor Representative and a licensed insurance agent for life, accident & health, and property & casualty. To ensure optimal planning, I collaborate with an outside team of attorneys, accountants and money managers._______________________________________________________________________HOW CAN I HELP?The best way for us to get started is to schedule a 10-minute call to see how I can help you.
name: Aaron Hail, CFP®, RICP®
